text: from Utah and Amy Klobuchar of Minnesota, right? Like, both sides are interested in this bill amongst other antitrust bills aimed at big tech. So you start by breaking them up and you don't let them operate both brokers and the exchange. It would be an order by order standard, which is one that I've advocated for in US markets for many years now. And so there are all sorts of other details in the bill.
